review: I wanted to love the Fire TV stick but continued to have issues. The price and concept are great but I always had trouble getting a solid internet connection. I intended to use this primarily for Netflix, Prime Instant Video and Pandora/Spotify. Watching Netflix was always the most difficult - audio and video never matched, I can't stand that! It would constantly go out in the middle of a show and I would have to wait for it to load again. It always got stuck at 25% and held there for a minute or so before fully loading. Then it would happen all over again in 5-10 minutes. I switched to watch Netflix on our Blu-Ray player and never had an issue so I know it wasn't an internet problem. Also had trouble with Pandora. It would take forever to load the app and start playing music. Once playing it typically worked fine but at times I would experience a long pause between songs.I decided to purchase this instead of a Roku or AppleTV because of all of the great reviews. So maybe I just got a faulty device but I sadly had to return it.
